title: JSON schema for surveys
description: This is the schema to be passed between a library or runtime system to the survey host. The JSON object will be interpreteed by the SurveyMan JS library

filename.description: The source file used to generate this survey. This string is a convenience for retreiving and parsing survey data.

breakoff.description: Indicates whether breakoff is permitted in this survey at any point. This will trigger a notice about allowing breakoff.

survey.description: The survey content. This essentially an array of blocks

id.description: The id generated for this block by the source program

subblocks.description: The list of blocks whose parent is this block

questions.description: The list of questions belonging to this bock

id.description: The id generated for this question from the source file (for files loaded from csv, this will be q_x_y, where x refers to the row and y refers to the column

qtext.description: The text of the question to be displayed

options.description: The list of options associated with this question

id.description: The id generated for this option from the source file (for files loaded from csv, this will be `comp_x_y`, where x refers to the row and y refers to the columm

branchMap.description: Map from option id to block id (i.e. string to string)
